an4.81:1.1: “Catuhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannagato yathabhatam nikkhitto evam niraye.
an4.81:1.3: Panatipati hoti, adinnadayi hoti, kamesumicchacari hoti, musavadi hoti—
an4.81:1.4: imehi kho, bhikkhave, catuhi dhammehi samannagato yathabhatam nikkhitto evam niraye.
an4.81:2.1: Catuhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannagato yathabhatam nikkhitto evam sagge.
an4.81:2.3: Panatipata pativirato hoti, adinnadana pativirato hoti, kamesumicchacara pativirato hoti, musavada pativirato hoti—
an4.81:2.4: imehi kho, bhikkhave, catuhi dhammehi samannagato yathabhatam nikkhitto evam sagge”ti.
